import React, { useState } from 'react'
import { Grid, Image, Container, Segment, Icon, Button } from 'semantic-ui-react'





export default function MoresInformations() {
    return (
        <Container>
            <Segment textAlign='center'>Les Informations à charger</Segment>
            <Grid columns={4} divided>
                <Grid.Row>
                    <Grid.Column>
                        <Segment textAlign='center'>Carnet de vaccination</Segment>
                        <Button as="label" htmlFor="file" type="button">
                            <Button.Content visible>
                                <Icon name="file" />
                            </Button.Content>
                        </Button>
                        <input
                            type="file"
                            id="file"
                            hidden
                        />
                    </Grid.Column>
                    <Grid.Column>
                        <Segment textAlign='center'>Carte national ou passport</Segment>
                        <Button as="label" htmlFor="file" type="button">
                            <Button.Content visible>
                                <Icon name="file" />
                            </Button.Content>
                        </Button>
                        <input
                            type="file"
                            id="file"
                            hidden
                        />
                    </Grid.Column>
                    <Grid.Column>
                        <Segment textAlign='center'>Carte Vital </Segment>
                        <Button as="label" htmlFor="file" type="button">
                            <Button.Content visible>
                                <Icon name="file" />
                            </Button.Content>
                        </Button>
                        <input
                            type="file"
                            id="file"
                            hidden
                        />
                    </Grid.Column>
                    <Grid.Column>
                        <Segment textAlign='center'>CV
</Segment>
                        <Button as="label" htmlFor="file" type="button">
                            <Button.Content visible>
                                <Icon name="file" />
                            </Button.Content>
                        </Button>
                        <input
                            type="file"
                            id="file"
                            hidden
                        />
                    </Grid.Column>
                </Grid.Row>
                <Grid.Row>
                    <Grid.Column>
                        <Segment textAlign='center'>Carnet de vaccination</Segment>
                        <Button as="label" htmlFor="file" type="button">
                            <Button.Content visible>
                                <Icon name="file" />
                            </Button.Content>
                        </Button>
                        <input
                            type="file"
                            id="file"
                            hidden
                        />
                    </Grid.Column>
                    <Grid.Column>
                        <Segment textAlign='center'>Carnet de vaccination</Segment>
                        <Button as="label" htmlFor="file" type="button">
                            <Button.Content visible>
                                <Icon name="file" />
                            </Button.Content>
                        </Button>
                        <input
                            type="file"
                            id="file"
                            hidden
                        />
                    </Grid.Column>
                    <Grid.Column>
                        <Segment textAlign='center'>Carnet de vaccination</Segment>
                        <Button as="label" htmlFor="file" type="button">
                            <Button.Content visible>
                                <Icon name="file" />
                            </Button.Content>
                        </Button>
                        <input
                            type="file"
                            id="file"
                            hidden
                        />
                    </Grid.Column>
                    <Grid.Column>
                        <Segment textAlign='center'>Carnet de vaccination</Segment>
                        <Button as="label" htmlFor="file" type="button">
                            <Button.Content visible>
                                <Icon name="file" />
                            </Button.Content>
                        </Button>
                        <input
                            type="file"
                            id="file"
                            hidden
                        />
                    </Grid.Column>
                </Grid.Row>
            </Grid>
        </Container>
    )
}
